reviews.review: I love this game so much and I wish I could play it for the first time again
TREMENDA OBRA MAESTRA 1,000,000,000/10 UFF Y EL FINAL
Words cannot describe how much I loved this game.
Amazing story, great puzzles, amazing atmosphere!
A really good game about solving physics based puzzles.

Valve knows how to make sequels (when they actualy decide to make them). It's bigger than first part, it has better story, it has Cave Johnson. It still has good puzzles to solve with your portal gun. If there's one thing I hate about this game it must be the absurd time skip. Like, it doesn't make any sense. However you can kind of alter it yourself because other than that one claim there's no evidence of that in the environment. This part has excellent modding support with active workshop community plus it's often used as a base for excellent fan sequels so it's a must have.
GLaDOS keeps insulting me every time I play with friends but the jokes on her, she's the one forced to watch me be stupid for hours on end.
10/10 Hot Asian chick finds potato in the basement. Greatest puzzle game of all time.
A massive step forward from the first portal in every way, easily replayable. Updated visuals, more variety in puzzles to solve and great VA's. 9/10 will be back soon

Обзоры никто не читает, поэтому те кто прочитал вот вам рецепт маринада с айраном под шашлыки из свинины:

Ингридиенты:
Свинина (окорок) - 2-2,5 кг
Маринад с аджикой:
Аджика - 2-3 ч. л.
Майонез - 2-3 ст. л.
Лук репчатый - 1-2 шт.
Соль - по вкусу
Перец черный молотый - по вкусу
*
Маринад из айрана:
Айран - 0,5 л
Лук репчатый - 1 шт.
Соль - по вкусу
Перец черный молотый - по вкусу

Подготавливаем продукты для шашлыка из свинины.

Мясо отделяем от пленок и режем средними кусочками. Делим мясо на две равные части.

Лук нарезаем полукольцами.

В одну тарелку с мясом добавляем лук, немного майонеза и пару ложек аджики. Немного солим, перчим и перемешиваем.

В другую тарелку с мясом также добавляем лук, перец, соль и заливаем мясо айраном. Перемешиваем и отставляем в сторонку.

Получившееся мясо перекладываем по пакетам и оставляем мариноваться на 2-3 часа.

По истечении данного отрезка времени готовим шашлык из свинины на мангале. Очень важно его не передержать, чтобы мясо получилось сочным!
Yo diría que es 3 veces mejor que la primera entrega. Recomendable para jugarlo alguna vez y con un amigo mejor.

This game is a masterpiece, from the second you start the game to the second the song ends this game is a ride. This takes all the great things from Portal 1 and adds loads of great things. Wheatley is a great villain, the best in any game I've played. The plot twist with Caroline was great along with finally exiting Aperture Science. "We do what we must, because we can" - 10/10 Would play again

A classic first-person puzzle game, that is enjoyable for anyone, yet challenging enough for even the most hardcore gamer. The effects introduced this time around have added another level of complexity to the test chambers, making them even more difficult. However, the mechanics of light surfaces, excursion funnels, and the mobility gels also provides players with options for exploring even the hardest testing chambers. The cooperative game is one of the best I've played, requiring team building and strategic problem solving, as well as absolute trust in your teammate. These cooperative challenges can be difficult for even the best of teams, but they are also a lot of fun. Overall, if you have not tried this awesome game or its predecessor, you are simply missing out.

Ce jeu est une pépite. J'ai acheté récemment les deux Portal et je les ai adorés. Le 2 est plus travaillé que le 1 (en même temps Portal était de base un supplément de la orange box). L'histoire est bien écrite, la touche d'humour s'ajoute vraiment bien ! En plus, quand on a fini le jeu, on peut créer et jouer aux salles de test de la communauté. On peut aussi jouer en coop ce qui est trop cool. Bref, je vous recommande ce jeu, il est incroyable

The game is great. I would recommend this to someone who doesn't have the best PC, as it has low system requirements. Overall the adventure in the game is great and the story just keeps you going.

At the moment I'm experiencing some issues with loading the game up, but hopefully they can fix that.
